post.title: 全新设计的p2p下载软件fopnu-支持内网、可自建聊天室
支持内网及i2p\tor的日系匿名p2p下载利器——amoeba
post.body:
[https://github.com/Alliance-Network/Amoeba](http://jump2.bdimg.com/safecheck/index?url=rN3wPs8te/r8jfr8YhogjfUWFoMgIRa8YcEvcQNQUR+C2HiW9QrdPlVzQ24hoR/hUhdtGjS4egQbjw7I8nsqMCKfezpg5gvlJyiEsvyVUjHL7eX+8bEA3qbuQ3V0D9i3Ks35h2nnSwuIqdkwQqRYepuQye2MG4bWMDxm7iZ2BjQ=)

补种：[http://pckldg.com/p2p/node.php#am5](http://jump2.bdimg.com/safecheck/index?url=x+Z5mMbGPAu6VPWSVnGSlLWahwbWTkqLC3z7TlChrTn8BT6ERX06uPOkclo9dFaTG48OyPJ7KjAin3s6YOYL5ScohLL8lVIxy+3l/vGxAN6m7kN1dA/YtyrN+Ydp50sLiKnZMEKkWHqbkMntjBuG1jA8Zu4mdgY0)

[教程：https://tieba.baidu.com/p/5397328714?red_tag=1132573334](http://教程：https://tieba.baidu.com/p/5397328714?red_tag=1132573334)

---

解压后运行core文件夹里面的Amoeba.Interface.exe就可以启动了，最好建一个桌面快捷方式。软件默认会将文件碎片和下载文件放在安装目录，文件碎片的缓存最低要求是32G，选择数据→下载，点击下载路径右边的按钮修改文件下载的位置。将你的IP地址复制到选项→连接→自定义→位置Uri中，注意看下面有条细线，就在那里粘贴，后面跟上默认的端口号:21411

按添加→确定。稍等片刻，在云→状态中可以看到自己的节点Uri地址

打开日本的P2P节点库网址：[http://pckldg.com/p2p/node.php#am5](http://jump2.bdimg.com/safecheck/index?url=x+Z5mMbGPAu6VPWSVnGSlLWahwbWTkqLC3z7TlChrTn8BT6ERX06uPOkclo9dFaTG48OyPJ7KjAin3s6YOYL5ScohLL8lVIxy+3l/vGxAN6m7kN1dA/YtyrN+Ydp50sLiKnZMEKkWHqbkMntjBuG1jA8Zu4mdgY0)，找到amoeba那里，将地址整个粘贴进上面的输入框中，然后按下登陆就可以了。

配合i2p：在I2P运行时，在浏览器中打开http://127.0.0.1:7657/configclients。
选中“SAM应用程序桥”项目的复选框。
单击保存客户端配置以保存设置

[http://127.0.0.1:7657/config](http://127.0.0.1:7657/config) 增大出入速度限制以保证连接稳定性

[服务] - > [选项] - > [连接] - > [i2p]
检查“i2p已启用”复选框。

如果在[Cloud]→[Connection]中显示“i2p：~~~~”，则表示连接成功。

配合TOR：http://seesaawiki.jp/amoeba_p2p/d/Tor%a4%ce%c0%df%c4%ea

post.title: 自建I2P outproxy 教程
post.body:
[https://github.com/l-n-s/super-i2p-server](https://github.com/l-n-s/super-i2p-server)

* * *

Ubuntu 16.04 x64 ram：512m+

sudo apt-get install software-properties-common
sudo apt-add-repository ppa:ansible/ansible
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install ansible

sudo apt-get upgrade

git clone [https://github.com/l-n-s/super-i2p-server.git](https://github.com/l-n-s/super-i2p-server.git) && cd super-i2p-server

cp inventory.ini.sample inventory.ini
vi inventory.ini
替换dummy.server.host.name 为你自己vps ip

ansible-playbook -i inventory.ini playbook.yml

yes

ansible-playbook -i inventory.ini playbook.yml -k
输入root 密码
执行完毕后需等待数分钟后，可通过bitvise ssh sftp 客户端进入/root/super-i2p-server/results 文件夹 打开 你的ip.txt
outproxy 后的字符即为你的BASE32 地址

建立本地i2p 客户端http 隧道，出口代理、ssl出口代理均为以上BE32地址即可。

[https://i2p.rocks/blog/hosting-an-outproxy-for-i2p-part-1.html](https://i2p.rocks/blog/hosting-an-outproxy-for-i2p-part-1.html)

post.title: Shareaza可连接gnutella、DC++ 网络的p2p下载软件
公网ip下的日系p2p加密下载神器--perfect dark
SSR\SS \v2ray\ Brook ONEKEY SCRIPT
post.body:
* * *

![56.jpg (720x544)](data/img/post_8_56.jpg)

* * *

---

* * *

wget --no-check-certificate [https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocksR.sh](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocksR.sh)
chmod +x shadowsocksR.sh
./shadowsocksR.sh 2>&1 | tee shadowsocksR.log

WIKI：[https://github.com/iMeiji/shadowsocks_install/wiki/](https://github.com/iMeiji/shadowsocks_install/wiki/)

release:[https://github.com/shadowsocksr/shadowsocksr-csharp/releases](http://dl.teddysun.com/files/ShadowsocksR-4.7.0-win.7z)

ss:

```
wget --no-check-certificate -O shadowsocks-all.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/teddysun/shadowsocks_install/master/shadowsocks-all.sh
chmod +x shadowsocks-all.sh
./shadowsocks-all.sh 2>&1 | tee shadowsocks-all.log
```

windows:[https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-windows/releases](https://github.com/shadowsocks/shadowsocks-windows/releases)

v2ray:

bash <(curl -L -s [https://install.direct/go.sh)](https://install.direct/go.sh))

service v2ray start

online config generator :[https://htfy96.github.io/v2ray-config-gen/](https://htfy96.github.io/v2ray-config-gen/)

core:[https://github.com/v2ray/v2ray-core/releases/tag/v2.38](https://github.com/v2ray/v2ray-core/releases/tag/v2.38)

BROOK

1.  wget -N --no-check-certificate [https://softs.fun/Bash/brook.sh](https://softs.fun/Bash/brook.sh) && chmod +x brook.sh && bash brook.sh
2.  备用下载：wget -N --no-check-certificate [https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ToyoDAdoubi/doubi/master/brook.sh](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ToyoDAdoubi/doubi/master/brook.sh) && chmod +x brook.sh && bash brook.sh
3.  **[https://github.com/txthinking/brook/releases](https://github.com/txthinking/brook/releases)**

### OpenVZ下安装TCP-BBR一键安装包命令

```
wget --no-check-certificate https://github.com/91yun/uml/raw/master/lkl/install.sh && bash install.sh
```

1.  修改 `/root/lkl/run.sh`，查找 `9000-9999` ，改成你想要的端口；
2.  修改 `/root/lkl/haproxy.cfg`，查找 `9000-9999` ，改成你想要的端口；
3.  重启 VPS

KVM BBR|

wget [http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/v4.9/linux-image-4.9.0-040900-generic_4.9.0-040900.201612111631_amd64.deb](http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/v4.9/linux-image-4.9.0-040900-generic_4.9.0-040900.201612111631_amd64.deb)

dpkg -i linux-image-4.9.0*.deb

update-grub

reboot

echo "net.core.default_qdisc=fq" >> /etc/sysctl.conf

echo "net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=bbr" >> /etc/sysctl.conf

sysctl -p

sysctl net.ipv4.tcp_available_congestion_control

lsmod | grep bbr

[https://www.echoteen.com/bbr-vps-install.html](https://www.echoteen.com/bbr-vps-install.html)​​​​​​​

post.title: sone基于Freenet的p2p社交&微博插件
post.body: You can enter this URI directly into the “Plugin Key” field on your Plugin Manager page:在配置-插件的最底部“从 Freenet 添加非官方插件”填入以下地址，点击加载 `USK@nwa8lHa271k2QvJ8aa0Ov7IHAV-DFOCFgmDt3X6BpCI,DuQSUZiI~agF8c-6tjsFFGuZ8eICrzWCILB60nT8KKo,AQACAAE/sone/74/sone-current.jar` 本插件需要 web of trust plugin 插件支持 在插件-官方插件中选择web of trust，点击加载即可。 ![bd3eb13533fa828b0cefaeb5fd1f4134960a5a93.gif (400x221)](data/img/post_6_bd3eb13533fa828b0cefaeb5fd1f4134960a5a93.gif)

post.title: twister一个开源的P2P微博网络
post.body:
twister本质上是一个不需要中心服务器的[twitter](http://jump2.bdimg.com/safecheck/index?url=rN3wPs8te/pL4AOY0zAwhz3wi8AXlR5gsMEbyYdIw60Ubcy+aTDl3rL16g69OcoE+9Xua/7RlA1p1Hkji89WFVeOHekhQ2vZwlXWIssB3fVIOGT8ajJwFxuPDsjyeyowUGbdg14vrvPtFEYDgRmb/WIDM5ju+jabze38ZILkZa42uaIl3pQO+89J+rw1XDSjyqvBGCnETvQwPGbuJnYGNA==).
twister不需要中心服务器，它使用基于[比特币](http://jump2.bdimg.com/safecheck/index?url=rN3wPs8te/pL4AOY0zAwhz3wi8AXlR5gsMEbyYdIw60meezJSXPzLznwm8Ll8QUyImOuUl9obIdesUqvhcRz+hXSuwz9b96EragWmZ1jer1XQuxoOXhQsbqU4q8rgJ6ljR831Y2WhmGOsb+GQKwAkaw23z2I02RmZDhtZBRJUgAke+PO5DkqW5O1hiCaDJO5Cs0R2i/nEoF2Pah4egTNMg==)与[bt下载](http://jump2.bdimg.com/safecheck/index?url=rN3wPs8te/pL4AOY0zAwhz3wi8AXlR5gsMEbyYdIw62/9edCBP7P9G337fbTErz2ZInIi4k8KEu5449mWp1SxBADVCHPuUFSTGH+WZuV+ecUBG6CY6mAzymb8tco/1qHjR831Y2WhmGOsb+GQKwAkaw23z2I02RmZDhtZBRJUgAke+PO5DkqW5O1hiCaDJO5Cs0R2i/nEoF2Pah4egTNMg==)的技术来构建一个[p2p](http://jump2.bdimg.com/safecheck/index?url=rN3wPs8te/pL4AOY0zAwhz3wi8AXlR5gsMEbyYdIw62jN2lgkyr3oSJjrlJfaGyHXrFKr4XEc/oV0rsM/W/ehK2oFpmdY3q9V0LsaDl4ULG6lOKvK4CepY0fN9WNloZhjrG/hkCsAJGsNt89iNNkZmQ4bWQUSVIAJHvjzuQ5KluTtYYgmgyTuQrNEdov5xKBdj2oeHoEzTI=)的网络，你的消息存放在这个p2p网络中，只要你在任何有互联网接入的地方，理论上都可以连入twister网络，使用全部功能。

项目发起人是巴西人Miguel Freitas
项目主页：[http://twister.net.co/](http://twister.net.co/)
